title: DISAGREEMENT With Robert Tallise
itunes:author: Toby Buckle
itunes:summary: What are we ultimately disputing when we disagree politically? Is progress across moral and political divides possible, and if so when? I get into a spontaneous lively conversion with Robert Talise on the epistemic foundations of political pluralism.
itunes:subtitle: What are we ultimately disputing when we disagreeâ€¦
description: What are we ultimately disputing when we disagree politically? Is progress across moral and political divides possible, and if so when? I get into a spontaneous lively conversion with Robert Talise on the epistemic foundations of political pluralism.
